interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Laloirelle Luminous Face Oil - Organic Pomegranate Oil, Cacao Oil Infused W/Brightening White Peony Root, Marigold Flower, Lotus Leaf - Glowing Skin That Feels Hydrated, Plump and Firm - 1.0 fl oz
Review Date: 2020/10/10
Store: Laloirelle
Average Rating: 4.1
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Laloirelle', 'Scent': 'Pomegranate', 'Item Form': 'Oil', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Fl Oz', 'Use for': 'Face', 'Package Dimensions': '5.67 x 2.36 x 2.32 inches; 4.55 Ounces'}
Review Text: This serum is so very very good! Smells warm and woodsy in a way, not floral or soapy. Very viscous, medium-heavy. The dropper only dispenses about 4 drops, which is enough for face and neck. I use a roller after applying too, which I highly recommend. I'm happy with the glow and hydration my skin has. The longer I use it, the better my skin looks.
Review Title: Extremely happy with this
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Natural Solution Himalayan Pink Salt Body Scrub with Organic Marula Essential Oil, Moisturizes and Nourishes Face & Skin - 12.3 Oz
Natural Solution
['Natural Solution Organic Marula Oil Body Scrub Exfoliate and nourish your skin with this luxurious Natural Solution body scrub made with organic marula oil. Marula oil is a natural oil & is known for its ability to moisturize and protect the skin, as well as to reduce the appearance of wrinkles and fine lines. This body scrub is also made with Himalayan pink salt, which is a natural exfoliator that helps to remove dead skin cells and leave your skin feeling smooth and soft. The scrub is gentle enough for daily use, and it is perfect for all skin types. Usage: Apply a generous amount of scrub to wet skin. Massage in circular motions for 2-3 minutes. Rinse with water. Use 2 times per week for best results. Caution: Avoid contact with eyes. If contact occurs, rinse immediately with water. Keep out of reach of children. Store in a cool, dry place. Benefits: 1- Exfoliates and removes dead skin cells 2- Moisturizes and nourishes the skin 3- Protects the skin from free radicals 4- Leaves skin feeling smooth and soft 5-Suitable for all skin types']
{'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '3.75 x 3.75 x 3.6 inches; 12.35 Ounces', 'Item model number': '8246E', 'UPC': '818581019775', 'Manufacturer': 'Natural Solution'}
There's not a lot of salt in here to make it exfoliate very well. That said, it moisturizes and hydrates beautifully. Everything dissolves and washes off completely and it smells so light and fresh!
Smells great! Works ok.
C.O. Bigelow No. 007 Dr Hiosous Quince Hand Lotion, 4 Ounces
C. O. Bigelow
{'Brand': 'C. O. Bigelow', 'Item Form': 'Lotion', 'Unit Count': '4 Ounce', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Use for': 'Hands', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '6.6 x 2 x 0.7 inches; 5.61 Ounces', 'Item model number': '20002240'}
This stuff is wonderful. It's been a game changer for my hands this winter. There is very little scent. Which suprised me because it's filled with so many natural extracts like apple, lemon, carrot, aloe, grapefruit.  The directions suggest to put on before bed and slip cotton gloves on. I'm not planning on doing that because I'm not 80, but am still very impressed at how long my hands feel protected and moisturized.
Awesome product
Organic Labs - Eyelash & Eyebrow Growth Serum - Enhancer Treatment to Grow Natural, Lush, Lavish Eyelashes & Eyebrows - Best Rapid Brow & Lash Boost for Longer, Fuller Lashes and Thicker Brows
Organic Labs
{'Brand': 'Organic Labs', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Item Weight': '0.04 Pounds', 'Package Type': 'Box', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '5.79 x 5 x 0.59 inches; 0.64 Ounces', 'UPC': '600291368584'}
I only received 1 tube of eyelash serum. I apply it right at my lash line, as directed, on a clean face. Have not seen any notable  difference. Does not sting or irritate my eyes.
Not sure if this works.
Lovrio 20" 20 Pcs 50g Glue Hair Extensions Piano Color Dirty Blonde mixed with Light Golden Blonde P18-22 Seamless in Human Hair Hair Extensions With Adhensive Tape
Lovrio
{'Brand': 'Lovrio', 'Hair Type': 'Oily', 'Installation Type': 'tape', 'Package Dimensions': '10.24 x 4.25 x 1.89 inches; 6.7 Ounces', 'UPC': '633085357099'}
Of all the extensions I've ordered, this is my least favorite. The blonde has so much brass in it! It's almost red in color. (I put a few pictures with my review. The lighter blonde is the color that I expect when I order blonde.) There are also more dark black strands coursing thru these pieces than any other brand I've used. Maybe it's just this particular color?  Comes with clips, which is nice. And hair is soft.
Not my favorite blonde
I WOKE UP LIKE THIS Turn-over Rice Perfect Oil Foam Cleanser – A Hypoallergenic Cleansing oil, Foaming Face Wash with Rice Bran Extract. Makeup Removal, Deep Facial Cleansing for Sensitive Skin
I WOKE UP LIKE THIS
{'Item Form': 'Oil', 'Skin Type': 'Sensitive', 'Brand': 'I WOKE UP LIKE THIS', 'Scent': 'Rose', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Package Dimensions': '5.39 x 3.31 x 1.54 inches; 2.43 Ounces'}
I love oil based cleansers and don't use anything else. But they are not for everyone. My 20 year old daughter doesn't like this product, while I think it's one of the best I've used. The smell is subtle and I love the suppleness of my skin after cleaning!
Top quality cleanser
lilah b. - Bronzed Beauty Bronzer Duo - b. sunkissed - Multipurpose Bronzer Duo to Highlight + Contour and Blend
LILAH B
{'Brand': 'LILAH B', 'Skin Tone': 'All', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Style': 'Compact', 'Package Dimensions': '3.8 x 3.5 x 1 inches; 0.32 Ounces', 'UPC': '851078006100'}
This is such a high end product. The weighted compact feels sleek and heavy in your hand. The slide/pivot opening is clever and works smooth. The color saturation is rich and deep and looks flawless on many skin tones. Not too much shimmer, so it actually looks like you've been sun kissed after application. Buildable color if you want a more intense look. You can use both colors together, which is what I do. I am medium complexion, blonde, 48 years old. This product doesn't increase pores size, nor does it settle into any wrinkles. In my opinion, deserving of more than 5 stars.
THE BEST BRONZER I'VE EVER USED
CESTLV Bamboo Charcoal Toothbrush + Toothpaste Kit (10 Pack Bulk), Hotel Amenities for Guest & Travel, BPA Free, Individually Boxed Dental Kits, Recyclable
C'est La Vie
{'Brand': "C'est La Vie", 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Special Feature': 'Charcoal Toothbrush', 'Power Source': 'Battery Powered', 'Material Feature': 'Recyclable', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '7.4 x 3.62 x 2.2 inches; 7.05 Ounces', 'Item model number': '0011', 'UPC': '703980635810'}
Very decent bamboo toothbrush. Generally the bristles are too soft for me. This one is medium-soft. So at least it feels like my mouth is clean after brushing. Lightweight, no guilt. Even the packaging is made from recycled material. Great to have multi pack!
Very nice brush
Purple Hair Mask for Blonde with Keratin & Jojoba Oil - Platinum & Silver Hair - Instantly Eliminate Brassiness & Yellows - Made in USA - Hair Toner - Bleached & Highlighted Hair - Sulfate Free - 8 oz
WELLUTION
{'Brand': 'WELLUTION', 'Item Form': 'Oil', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Hair Type': 'Damaged,Dry,Color-treated', 'Product Benefits': 'Hydrating Treatment', 'Package Dimensions': '3.07 x 2.9 x 2.8 inches; 8 Ounces', 'UPC': '749715278440'}
This masks works great! My hair is blonde and fine and tends to go brassy if not processed correctly. Using this mask is an easy way to freshen and brighten. Not too thick, almost whipped in texture. Totally moisturizes and rinses out without heavy residue.
Very happy with results
JDO Eyelash Curler and 4D Silk Fiber Lash Mascara Value Set-Lash Curler with Refill Pads for No Pinching or Pulling, Mascara Natural Thickening- Long Lasting Waterproof & Smudge-Proof
JDO
{'Package Dimensions': '6 x 4 x 1 inches; 3.21 Ounces'}
My 14 yo is using this set and she loves it. The mascara is a deep black and it doesn't flake off. She also has had no problems removing this product with just a wet makeup wipe.  The curler has rubber grips at the end so it is easy for her to hold and use. Very happy with this.
Happy with this

profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary:**

- **Product Preference:** The user continues to favor personal care products with natural ingredients, specifically those with moisturizing and nourishing oils and rich natural extracts for effective hydration. Their recent purchase of an organic face oil reflects this preference.

- **Hair Care Interest:** The user is exploring hair extensions cautiously due to past experiences with color consistency and quality. They have proactively purchased a hair mask for color-treated hair, indicating a commitment to maintaining vibrant hair health.

- **Cleansing Habits:** They express a strong preference for oil-based cleansers, valuing their effectiveness for sensitive skin.

- **Performance Expectations:** The user seeks products that ensure effective moisturization and hydration for both skin and hair.

- **Fragrance Sensitivity:** They prefer minimal scents, favoring light and subtle aromas over strong fragrances.

- **Color Cosmetics Interest:** The user shows an interest in high-quality makeup that enhances natural beauty. Their recent acquisition of an eyelash curler and mascara for a young family member highlights their family-oriented approach while valuing ease of use.

- **Dental Care Consideration:** They are interested in eco-friendly dental products, emphasizing sustainability and effectiveness.

- **Usage Pattern:** Comfortable with regular-use products, they appreciate versatile solutions suitable for all skin types.

- **Overall Assessment:** The user actively explores skincare and cosmetic products that combine hydration, nourishment, and gentle formulations, demonstrating a commitment to quality and efficacy tailored to their family's needs.
